content.en: AI-aided CT diagnosis: Researchers have been investigating the capabilities of artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms in detecting critical findings in head CT scans. These algorithms have shown promise in accurately detecting and classifying intracranial hemorrhages, fractures, and other abnormalities. By improving the diagnostic accuracy and reducing the time to diagnosis, AI algorithms have the potential to assist radiologists and improve patient outcomes in various clinical settings.
content.da: AI-assisteret CT-diagnose: Forskere har undersøgt mulighederne for kunstig intelligens (AI)-algoritmer til at opdage kritiske fund i hoved-CT-scanninger. Disse algoritmer har vist lovende resultater i nøjagtigt at opdage og klassificere intrakranielle blødninger, frakturer og andre abnormiteter. Ved at forbedre diagnosticeringsnøjagtigheden og reducere tiden til diagnose, har AI-algoritmer potentiale til at hjælpe radiologer og forbedre patientresultater i forskellige kliniske sammenhænge.
